title: Trump shows 'white genocide' evidence: Presented videos, docs to Ramaphosa; SAfrica rejects claim
content: During a tense White House meeting, President Trump confronted South African President Ramaphosa with videos and documents alleging a "white genocide" in South Africa. Ramaphosa refuted Trump's claims, emphasizing that crime affects all South Africans, regardless of race.

title: 'I know my worth': Is Shashi Tharoor 'forcing' his way out of Congress?
content: Tensions escalate between Shashi Tharoor and the Congress party as Tharoor's repeated praise for PM Modi's policies and acceptance of a government nomination have widened the existing gap. The Congress leadership is unhappy with Tharoor's actions, leading to speculation about his future within the party.

title: Hit by turbulence, IndiGo flight lands safely in Srinagar with damaged nose
content: An IndiGo flight, 6E 2142, from Delhi to Srinagar, safely landed at 6.46 pm on Wednesday after encountering a sudden hailstorm mid-air. The Airbus A321 (VT-IMD) experienced turbulence, prompting the pilots to alert Srinagar ATC. While the aircraft sustained nose damage, all passengers and crew are safe.

title: Denmark's largest construction company returns keys of Tesla cars
content: Danish construction firm Tscherning has divested its entire Tesla fleet, citing Elon Musk's political stances as the primary reason. This decision mirrors a broader trend in Europe, where Tesla's brand image and sales are suffering due to consumer concerns over Musk's political affiliations. The company is opting for European alternatives, highlighting the impact of political views on corporate purchasing decisions.

title: JPMorgan Chase to managers: Resist hiring, remember attrition is …
content: JPMorgan Chase is implementing a hiring slowdown, prioritizing efficiency gains through artificial intelligence. The bank anticipates a 10% reduction in operations staff due to AI advancements in areas like fraud and payment processing. While overall headcount growth is being curbed, strategic hiring will continue in key areas such as banking, advising, and branch expansion.

title: Walmart Boycott: America's largest retailer to protestors, 'We remain ...'
content: The People's Union USA is spearheading a nationwide boycott of Walmart from May 20-26, protesting the retailer's labor practices and community impact. The group alleges economic corruption and criticizes the rollback of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion efforts. Following the Walmart boycott, Target and McDonald's are slated for similar economic blackouts in June.

title: Dust storm, rain lash Delhi-NCR; trees uprooted, power cuts reported
content: Delhi-NCR experienced a sudden weather change on Wednesday evening. A severe hailstorm with heavy rainfall hit the region. Strong winds and dust affected visibility in the capital. The weather department reported wind speeds of 60-70 kmph. A cyclonic circulation over Haryana is influencing the weather. This followed intense heat, with the heat index reaching 50.

title: Accenture hikes salaries for first time in 2.5 years; 15,000 in India promoted
content: Accenture is promoting nearly 50,000 staff globally this June, including 15,000 in India. This move follows a delayed cycle due to reduced consulting demands. Additionally, Associate Managers and higher positions will see pay hikes ranging from 3% to 13%, their first in 2.5 years.

title: IPL: Suryakumar, Dhir’s late blitzkrieg, bowlers help MI secure last playoff spot
content: Mumbai Indians secured the final playoff spot in IPL 2025 with a dominant 59-run victory over Delhi Capitals. Suryakumar Yadav's explosive 73 and Naman Dhir's quickfire 24 propelled MI to a formidable total, while Jasprit Bumrah and Mitchell Santner dismantled DC's batting lineup. DC's batting order collapsed, resulting in a disappointing end to their playoff aspirations.

title: 'Attempt to hoodwink': India rejects Pak's Balochistan bus attack claim
content: India has vehemently denied Pakistan's accusations of involvement in the deadly suicide bombing that targeted a school bus in Balochistan's Khuzdar district. The Ministry of External Affairs condemned the attack, expressing condolences while dismissing Pakistan's claims as a diversion from its own internal issues and reputation as a hub of terrorism.

title: Explained: Why India can deal with negative effects of Trump’s tariffs
content: Despite potential disruptions from US tariffs, India's robust domestic market and minimal export dependency position it favorably. Moody's suggests India could even benefit long-term from America's high duties.

title: India wants full exemption from Trump’s 26% tariffs: Report
content: India and the US are in talks to finalise the first phase of a trade deal by July. Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal is in the US for discussions. India wants relief from a 26% duty on some items.

title: Cannes 2025: Aishwarya Rai stuns in regal Indian look, flaunts sindoor like a queen
content: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan marked her 22nd Cannes appearance in 2025. She arrived with her daughter, Aaradhya. Aishwarya wore an ivory and gold traditional outfit. Her sindoor and maroon lipstick stood out. The outfit featured embroidery and a cape-style dupatta. Her appearance is considered a highlight of Cannes 2025. She continues to be a Bollywood legend and style icon.

title: Flights delayed, chaos on roads as big storm hits Delhi-NCR
content: Delhi experienced a powerful thunderstorm with wind speeds reaching 60–70 km/h, causing traffic disruptions and flight delays. The storm, triggered by a cyclonic circulation over Haryana and nearby areas, followed a day of extreme heat where the heat index soared to 50.2°C.

title: Watch: Israeli troops open fire near diplomats visiting West Bank
content: Israeli forces fired warning shots at Italian diplomats near Jenin after they allegedly strayed from an approved route in what the IDF termed an active combat zone. The incident, prompting condemnation and demands for clarification from Italy and the EU, involved diplomats from over 30 countries assessing the humanitarian situation.

title: Big HC setback for Tamil Nadu on V-C appointments
content: The Madras high court has temporarily halted a provision allowing the Tamil Nadu government to appoint vice chancellors in state universities, despite the government's opposition. This stay stems from a petition arguing the amendments conflict with UGC regulations and the constitutional distribution of powers.

title: India declares another Pak official persona non grata
content: India declared a Pakistani official persona non grata. The official was asked to leave within 24 hours. This action follows a previous expulsion of another Pakistani official earlier in May. Tensions rose after India's counterterror operation and strikes on terror launchpads across Pakistan. Pakistan responded with drone incursions. India then destroyed key Pakistani military installations. A ceasefire was later reached.

title: Aditya Chopra once allegedly threatened Kangana Ranaut for rejecting 'Sultan'
content: Aditya Chopra, known for directing iconic films and shaping Bollywood careers, married Rani Mukerji in a private ceremony after a period of friendship and mutual support. However, his career has not been without controversy, including a notable clash with Kangana Ranaut, who publicly recounted a tense exchange after declining a film offer.

title: Will Donald Trump Jr. run for US president in 2028? Here's what he said
content: Donald Trump Jr. addressed speculation about a future presidential run at the Qatar Economic Forum, stating 'maybe one day' he would consider it. He later criticized Reuters for misrepresenting his remarks, clarifying he has no immediate interest in running for office. Trump Jr.

title: The Field Marshal mirage: What is Pakistan rewarding Asim Munir for?
content: General Asim Munir gets promoted to Field Marshal in Pakistan. This happens after a military clash with India. The promotion is seen as a move to protect Munir. Pakistan faces internal security and political problems. Imran Khan's party criticizes Munir. The promotion may strengthen Munir's position. However, challenges remain for Pakistan. These include internal threats and political tension.

title: HPBOSE Class 12 revised result 2025 announced : 88.64% pass; check direct link here
content: The Himachal Pradesh Board of School Education (HPBOSE) has announced the revised Class 12 results for the March 2025 examination, with a pass percentage of 88.64%. The updated results are available on the official HPBOSE website, where students can check their marks using their roll numbers. The last date for re-evaluation and re-inspection applications is June 5, 2025. Final merit lists will be released after the re-evaluation results.

title: 'Marital rape not legal offence': HC quashes Sec 377 case against husband
content: The Delhi high court has dismissed an order to prosecute a husband under Section 377 for "unnatural" sex with his wife, citing the marital rape exception and contradictions in the wife's statements. The court emphasized that Section 377 doesn't apply to non-penile-vaginal intercourse within marriage, especially without explicit lack of consent.

title: Ben Stokes reveals what he texted Virat Kohli on his Test retirement
content: England Test captain Ben Stokes expressed his disappointment that Virat Kohli won't be participating in the upcoming Test series between India and England. Stokes acknowledged Kohli's fighting spirit, competitiveness, and desire to win, highlighting his significant impact on the Indian team. Despite Kohli's absence, Stokes recognizes India's incredible batting depth and warns against underestimating them.

title: 'Criminal conspiracy': ED's big charges against Gandhis in National Herald case
content: The Rouse Avenue court commenced hearing the ED's case against Sonia and Rahul Gandhi in the National Herald matter, focusing on alleged money laundering involving a Rs 90.25 crore loan. The ED argued that Congress party donors were cheated, and Young Indian was a sham entity used to misappropriate assets worth over Rs 2,000 crore.

title: Scotch whisky set to become cheaper in India
content: Diageo Plc anticipates reducing Scotch whisky prices in India following the India-UK FTA, potentially benefiting consumers in the world's largest whisky market. The FTA will slash tariffs, leading to price drops, though the actual impact depends on state taxes and company strategies. While the deal may boost demand, concerns remain about red tape, minimum import pricing, and potential price wars.

title: These Royals are blocking Prince Harry's reunion with King Charles III
content: Royal family tensions escalate as King Charles III grapples with cancer and a strained relationship with Prince Harry. Insiders reveal that Prince William, Kate Middleton, and Queen Camilla are allegedly hindering reconciliation efforts. The King is reportedly deeply hurt by Harry's portrayal of Camilla in his memoir, 'Spare,' where he criticized her role in Charles and Princess Diana's marriage.

title: Waqf not a fundamental right or essential part of Islam, Centre tells SC
content: The Centre has informed the Supreme Court that waqf, while an Islamic concept, isn't an essential part of Islam and thus can't be claimed as a fundamental right. This statement was made during arguments defending the Waqf (Amendment) Act, 2025, which is being challenged in court.

title: How much Manchester United or Tottenham will earn by winning the Europa League
content: Manchester United and Tottenham Hotspur are set to clash in the 2025 UEFA Europa League final in Bilbao, vying for a £10.95 million prize. The winner not only secures the trophy but also a coveted Champions League spot, potentially worth over €50 million.

title: China-Pak economic corridor to expand into Afghanistan: Why it matters for India
content: Pakistan and China agreed to extend the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor to Afghanistan. India consistently opposed this move due to construction in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir. This trilateral meeting occurred after Operation Sindoor. New Delhi raised concerns over terror infrastructure funded by Pakistan. Afghanistan's inclusion raises concerns for India, given existing border issues with China and Pakistan.

title: Best football players in the world ranked: Where do Messi and Ronaldo stand?
content: Vinícius Júnior claimed the Best FIFA Men's Player award in 2025, surpassing Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo in the rankings. The emergence of young talents like Rodri, Jude Bellingham, and Lamine Yamal signals a shift in football's landscape. While Messi and Ronaldo remain influential, rising stars are making their mark, leading to an exciting future for the sport.

title: 'Maoist organisation headless': How a 72-hr op took out top commander
content: In a major anti-Maoist operation, Chhattisgarh's DRG jawans killed 27 Maoists in Abujhmarh forests, Narayanpur. Sources claim CPI (Maoist) general secretary Basava Raju, carrying a Rs 1.5 crore bounty, was among those eliminated. One DRG jawan was also killed in the encounter. The operation followed extensive planning based on intelligence inputs confirming Raju's presence.

title: Walker Buehler gives a fitting reply to Mets’ Francisco Lindor after ejection
content: Tuesday's Mets-Red Sox game was marred by drama and ejections, overshadowing Boston's victory. Walker Buehler's ejection, fueled by Francisco Lindor's on-field behavior and a controversial umpire call, sparked a social media exchange. Buehler criticized Lindor's actions following his ejection, while manager Alex Cora also faced ejection for arguing with the umpire over questionable calls.

title: 'Bangalore Metro Chicks' Instagram page sparks outrage
content: An Instagram account named 'Bangalore Metro Chicks' is facing criticism for allegedly sharing photos and videos of female commuters on Bengaluru's Namma Metro without their permission. The account, which has garnered over 5,000 followers, has prompted outrage, with a social media user alerting the city police

title: Sources: OKC's Gilgeous-Alexander wins NBA MVP
content: The Thunder's Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, who averaged 32.7 points on 51.9% shooting to win the league's scoring title, has earned his first NBA MVP, sources told ESPN.

title: Sources: Tempers flare in tense tush push debate
content: Debate over the tush push led to a heated exchange between NFL owners and league executives, sources told ESPN.

title: KU adds former star player Vaughn to Self's staff
content: Kansas is hiring former star player and two-time NBA head coach Jacque Vaughn as an assistant coach, the school announced on Wednesday.

title: Penske fires Cindric in wake of cheating scandal
content: Roger Penske has fired team president Tim Cindric, IndyCar managing director Ron Ruzewski and IndyCar general manager Kyle Moyer in the wake of an Indianapolis 500 cheating scandal.

title: NFL introducing new award for offensive linemen
content: The NFL is introducing the Protector of the Year Award, which will be given to the league's best offensive lineman, it was announced at the league's spring meeting Wednesday.

title: Coach: Canes must be smarter about retaliation
content: Carolina Hurricanes coach Rod Brind'Amour said his players have to be smarter about retaliating against the Florida Panthers' trademark agitation.

title: 'Hard Knocks' to feature Bills, NFC East this year
content: HBO's "Hard Knocks" will feature the Buffalo Bills during training camp, before transitioning to coverage of teams in the NFC East during the regular season, commissioner Roger Goodell announced on Wednesday.

title: Lions pull proposal to change NFL playoff seeding
content: The Lions have withdrawn their rule proposal that would have seeded the playoffs by record and not guaranteed division winners a home game.

title: ND, Wisconsin to play Lambeau game in 2026
content: Notre Dame and Wisconsin will play their postponed Lambeau Field game on Sept. 6, 2026, a Sunday, in the first college football contest at the historic Green Bay venue in a decade.

title: 🏈 Projecting top NFL rookies in 10 categories
content: We predicted the NFL's top rookies in 10 different stats for the 2025 season. Who will dominate box scores this fall?

title: Reggie’s 8 points in nine seconds headlines the wild history of Pacers-Knicks
content: New York and Indiana have had some major playoff battles. Will the 2025 Eastern Conference finals live up to the drama?

title: Stop worrying and celebrate the tush push -- all the reasons it deserved to live
content: Some believe the play is unstoppable, and now it has proved unkillable -- even for the NFL and its owners.

title: Updated top 50 MLB prospect rankings: There's a new No. 1 on our midseason list
content: Starting with a pair of players on the verge of the majors, let's rank baseball's next wave of stars.

title: The secret routines fueling NBA players' grip on the game
content: Whether it's hand cream or powder, the on-court routines of NBA players have become a leaguewide obsession.

title: Why the NBA's 26 eliminated teams should watch these conference finals
content: As four teams battle for the title, 26 teams are looking to improve -- and watching the conference finals can help.

title: No QBs allowed: We name the 25 best non-QB players for 2025
content: It's not all about quarterbacks. These players could have a big impact on 2025, even if they don't throw a pass.

title: Conference finals horoscopes: Which teams will ascend? Which will go in retrograde?
content: What does the zodiac have to say about the Knicks, Thunder, Pacers and Wolves? Neil Paine shares his reading.

title: How FSU rallied around coach Lonni Alameda after her cancer diagnosis
content: Inside FSU softball coach Lonni Alameda's cancer experience and her support from FSU and the softball community.

title: NFL excited about Olympic flag football, but will its stars participate?
content: A vote Tuesday paved the way for players such as Patrick Mahomes and Tyreek Hill to play Olympic flag football.

title: Are the A's really playoff contenders?! An early verdict on MLB's most surprising teams
content: We offer an early postseason verdict on five of MLB's most surprising teams almost two months into the 2025 season.

title: Flick signs new Barcelona deal after LaLiga win
content: Barcelona coach Hansi Flick has extended his contract with the club after guiding them to the LaLiga trophy, signing a new deal until 2027.

title: Pep tells Man City: Reduce squad size or I'll quit
content: Pep Guardiola said he would rather leave Manchester City than have to work with a bloated squad next season.

title: Casemiro hails Man Utd season as one of his best
content: Casemiro has called his current campaign with Manchester United, who are also in the Europa League final, "one of the most successful seasons" of his career.

title: Sources: USMNT's Cardoso top target for Atlético
content: Johnny Cardoso is Atlético Madrid's top target as they look to strengthen the midfield line in the summer transfer window, sources have told ESPN.

title: Source: Barça interested in Liverpool's Díaz
content: Barcelona are eyeing Luis Diaz to strengthen their attack next season, but they are also assessing other options due to the difficulties in signing him

title: Man City's first Club WC rival part with coach
content: Four weeks before facing Manchester City in its opening Club World Cup game in Philadelphia, Wydad coach Rhulani Mokwena has left the Moroccan club.

title: Alonso will do 'very well' at Madrid - Carvajal
content: Real Madrid defender Dani Carvajal said "only time will tell" if Xabi Alonso can "revert the situation" following the team's disappointing season.

title: Foden on City struggles: 'A lot of things going on'
content: Phil Foden has said he has "struggled" for Manchester City this season because of off-field issues and an ankle injury.

title: Angel City is a splashy, star-studded lifestyle brand. Is it ready to be a good soccer team?
content: With celebrity owners such as Natalie Portman and cool lifestyle merch drops, Angel City is a preeminent brand in women's soccer. Is being a good soccer team next?

title: Grading how every men's Big 12 basketball team performed in 2024-25
content: From BYU's run to the Sweet 16 to Colorado's 0-13 start to conference play, we evaluate all 16 teams.

title: Minnesota on top, Golden State at the bottom in Week 1
content: Minnesota, New York and Indiana are 1-2-3 in Week 1, but which team climbed eight spots from our preseason rankings?

title: NBA playoff futures: Knicks favored in East; OKC is Finals favorite
content: With the conference finals underway, here are the updated odds to win the NBA championship and Finals MVP.

title: Stanley Cup playoff odds: Panthers slight East favorites
content: Every playoff team's odds to win the 2025 Stanley Cup and favorites for the Conn Smythe Trophy for playoff MVP.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea, Liverpool, PSG want Benfica star Araújo
content: Chelsea, Liverpool and Paris Saint-Germain are in competition for Benfica defender Tomás Araújo. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.Foot

title: 17 local bodies get 4.5 acres of govt. land for setting up waste management facilities
content: The land cannot be used for other purposes and local bodies cannot lease, sub-lease, or pledge it with any financial institution. Construction of waste treatment plants and material collection facilities must begin within a year of allotment

title: Miss India among 24 finalists for Miss World 2025 talent competition
content: The finalists were chosen after a series of internal auditions and a competitive rounds held privately at the hotel where the 108 contestants are staying

title: Gang murders 27-year-old man in Ranipet after row over rash driving
content: The victim had earlier complained to police over threats to his life. Angered over the police not acting on the complaint filed by him, residents blocked Nemili-Panapakkam main road; they dispersed after the police promised prompt action

title: Priyanka urges CM to expedite relief measure for landslide victims in Wayanad
content: Several interim measures announced by the government following the tragedy are yet to be implemented, leaving victims struggling to rebuild their lives, she says in letter to Chief Minister

title: SIT report on Murshidabad violence has exposed TMC’s ‘anti-Hindu brutality’, says BJP
content: BJP spokesperson Sudhanshu Trivedi claimed SIT findings showed planned targeting of Hindus, and questioned Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on action against party leaders and police inaction during the April riots.

title: Migrant girl’s journey now part of Kerala’s school curriculum
content: A memoir in the form of a letter to a friend—where Dharaksha Parveen recalls her childhood in Bihar and how her life changed after moving to Kerala—has been included in the new textbook for Class VI in Kerala.

title: Maoists desperate to regain lost ground in Andhra-Odisha Border after Basavaraju’s death
content: With tribal sympathisers refusing to join Maoists and combing operations getting intensified, the Left Wing extremists find it hard to strengthen their footing in AOB region

title: J&K Govt. offices ordered to stop using unofficial digital platforms
content: The government also barred the use of personal email services such as Gmail, Yahoo, or Rediffmail for any official communication

title: Ruling National Conference’s working committee meets in Srinagar, seeks special status, statehood
content: Party reaffirms commitment to peaceful democratic struggle, condemns violence, and appeals to India and Pakistan to seek lasting peace

title: EPFO adds 7.54 lakh new subscribers in March
content: Of the total new subscribers added in March, 58.94% are in the 18-25 years age group; around 2.08 lakh new female subscribers joined in March

title: Hacker Steals Data From US Government Through App Used By Trump Aide
content: Reuters identified more than 60 government users of the messaging platform TeleMessage in a cache of leaked data provided by Distributed Denial of Secrets, a nonprofit whose stated mission is to archive hacked and leaked documents in public interest.

title: 'Near-Death Experience': Trinamool MPs' Team On IndiGo Plane Caught In Storm
content: TMC leader Sagarika Ghose, who was on the turbulence-hit Indigo Delhi-Srinagar flight, termed it a "near-death experience."

title: Will IndiGo Curb Deal With Turkish Airlines After Op Sindoor? What CEO Said
content: IndiGo, which is facing calls for ending or curbing its codeshare agreement with Turkish Airlines, is "fully compliant" with regulations in India but is open to making changes if the rules are altered, the airline's CEO Pieter Elbers has said.

title: Deepening Rift Between Muhammad Yunus, Bangladesh Army Chief?
content: A round of meetings in Bangladesh has once again led major differences between Bangladesh Army Chief General Waker-Uz-Zaman and Chief Adviser of the interim government Muhammad Yunus, per reports.

title: Probe Agency ED's Big Accusation Against Sonia Gandhi In National Herald Case
content: Congress leader Sonia Gandhi "abused" her position as the then Congress president for personal gains to herself and her son Rahul Gandhi by converting public money for self use through the Young Indian (YI) company, the ED alleged.

title: Video: Passengers Scream As IndiGo Flight Hit By Turbulence, Aircraft Damaged
content: A Srinagar-bound IndiGo flight from Delhi, with more than 200 passengers on board, experienced strong turbulence as it navigated through an unexpected hailstorm that damaged a small portion of the aircraft's nose on Wednesday.

title: Why China Is "Seriously Concerned" Over US Golden Dome Defence System
content: However, China has expressed serious concerns over the project, with Foreign Ministry spokesperson Mao Ning stating that it carries "strong offensive implications" and heightens the risks of militarisation of outer space and an arms race.

title: Ayodhya Ram Temple Construction To Be Completed By June 5: Official
content: The construction of the iconic Ram temple in Ayodhya will be completed by June 5 and the consecration of 'Ram Darbar' will be performed in a ceremony beginning June 3, according to Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Construction Committee Chairman Nripendra Misra.

title: Trump Confronts South Africa's Ramaphosa Over Claims Of A "White Genocide"
content: US President Donald Trump on Wednesday confronted his South African counterpart at the White House over an inflammatory speech made by the latter's colleague, calling for the death of white farmers in the African nation.

title: J&K Lt Governor Announces Government Job For Family Of Shelling Victims
content: One member of each family that lost a loved one in the recent cross-border shelling in Jammu and Kashmir will be given a government job, Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha said on Wednesday, assuring the affected people of their proper rehabilitation.

title: US Accepts Qatar's Boeing 747 Gift For Donald Trump's Use
content: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has accepted a gifted Boeing 747 aircraft from Qatar for President Donald Trump to use as Air Force One, the Pentagon said Wednesday.

title: Gujarati Man Shot Dead In US Shop By Robber Posing As Customer
content: The victim was in the shop, when the killer came to the shop and posed as a customer. The killer first tried to rob him of the money at the cash counter.

title: Chennai Cop Dies By Suicide Ahead Of Drunk Driving Inquiry
content: In a tragic incident, a 40-year-old head constable with the city police committed suicide after setting himself ablaze near the Taramani MRTS railway station on Wednesday.

title: Meitei Group Calls 48-Hr Strike Over 'Manipur' Signage Removal
content: The Coordinating Committee on Manipur Integrity, an umbrella body of the Meitei community, has called a 48-hour state-wide shutdown from Wednesday midnight to protest against the reported removal of the signage containing the word "Manipur".

title: BSF Destroyed 5 Pak Posts, 1 Terror Launch Pad Across Jammu Border: Official
content: The Border Security Force (BSF) destroyed five Pakistani posts and a terrorist launch pad across the Jammu border in an operation, an officer said on Wednesday.

title: Power Cuts, Traffic Jams, Toppled Hoardings As Storm Hits Delhi-Noida
content: A massive storm, followed by rain, hit Delhi and Noida this evening, disrupting traffic and leading to waterlogging and power cuts in several areas.

title: Liquor Bottles Found In Bihar Senior Cop's Office, Special Panel Formed For Probe
content: A huge quantity of sealed liquor bottles was recovered from the SSP office premises in Gaya Ji district in dry Bihar, and two policemen were initially detained in this connection, but later released, following a detailed examination.

title: "Impersonating Myself To Me": Paytm CEO Shares Exchange With Scamster
content: Vijay Shekhar Sharma, the chief of Paytm left his followers in splits today, sharing screenshots of his conversation with someone impersonating him.

title: US State Secretary Vows To Tackle Visa Backlog Before World Cup
content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio promised Wednesday to redouble efforts to issue visas ahead of the World Cup, warning of a backlog so long that Colombians may have already needed to apply.

title: Centre's Big Bhakra Dam Security Move Amid Punjab-Haryana Water Row
content: The central government took stern action, deploying Central Industrial Security Forces to protect the Bhakra Dam as the fresh cycle to water distribution started earlier today.

title: Congress demands action against Malviya, Goswami for 'defaming' Rahul Gandhi, party
content: Congress General Secretary Jairam Ramesh said multiple complaints have been filed against Amit Malviya and Arnab Goswami in different parts of the country

title: The world needs to be told the truth: DMK MP Kanimozhi
content: The DMK Parliamentary Party leader is heading an eight-member delegation to five countries, including Russia, as part of Centre’s diplomatic offensive in the wake of conflict with Pakistan

title: Creation of waqfs is not an essential religious practice of Islam: Centre
content: A Muslim who does not create a waqf would not be less Muslim or cease to be a Muslim, says Solicitor-General; he stresses that the amended law only focuses on administrative aspects

title: MGNREGA wages must rise to ₹400 per day: Jairam Ramesh
content: Citing a LibTech India report, Mr. Ramesh noted a mismatch in registered households and actual work provided; says wage rates have stagnated for a decade and need systematic review by a Standing Committee

title: J&K Lt. Governor announces government jobs for kin of Pakistan shelling victims
content: Manoj Sinha vows enhanced border infrastructure and security, praises bravery of residents and soldiers amid recent tensions

title: Development of longer range BrahMos missile as well as sleeker BrahMos-NG variant on track
content: Expected to be ready for flight testing in a year or two, the new BrahMos-NG is a sleeker missile than the current variants, and will be much lighter at half the weight of the current air launched missile

title: PM to inaugurate 103 Amrit Bharat railway stations on May 22
content: Over 1,300 stations are being redeveloped across the country under the Amrit Bharat Station Scheme (ABSS), with a blend of modern facilities and regional architecture, a Railways Ministry spokesperson stated

title: LDF govt. trying to weaken Panchayat Raj system: Sunny Joseph
content: KPCC president terms the ongoing ward delimitation unscientific and unilateral and in line with the preferences of the ruling party

title: Basavaraju’s killing a major achievement for security forces: ex-adviser to Home Ministry
content: Basavaraju was an expert in handling explosives, and more prone to violence when compared with  Mullapalla Rao alias Ganapathi, his predecessor, K. Vijay Kumar, former Special Security Advisor, Ministry of Home Affairs said

title: ED searches on educational institutions linked to Parameshwara leads to political storm
content: Raids covered 16 locations in connection with the gold smuggling case allegedly involving Kannada actor Ranya Rao

title: ₹956.16 cr. cut from Kerala’s IGST share, says Finance dept.
content: Finance Minister says Centre has slashed IGST shares of all States on the grounds that excess amounts have been credited to them. Under this decision, Kerala’s IGST share has been reduced by ₹956.16 crore. However, there is a lack of clarity regarding the excess settlements

title: Manipur government orders probe into bus incident, Meitei group calls 48-hour strike
content: The Coordinating Committee on Manipur Integrity demanded an apology from the Governor and the resignation of the State’s Security Advisor, Chief Secretary, and DGP

title: Summer cut short, monsoon on the horizon for Telangana
content: Region is already witnessing pre-monsoon showers and day temperatures have plummeted with the humidity being on the higher side due to the Easterlies from the Bay of Bengal: TGDPS

title: Union Minister accuses Congress of taking national security lightly
content: “The people of the country are watching who is standing with the soldiers, and who is speaking in Pakistan’s tune,” the Minister said

title: Collector seeks report on crack found on NH 66 in Manathala
content: Collector forms a high-level expert committee to conduct a joint inspection and submit a comprehensive report

title: Call for urgent delimitation gains voice at Guntur forum
content: The current representation in Parliament continues to rely on population data from the 1971 census, despite exponential demographic changes across the country since then, says High Court advocate Umesh Chandra

title: Bridging programme will be held for students when schools reopen: Minister
content: Minister says students returning from summer vacation would need to revisit what they had learnt so that they can go on to study new textbooks without any hiccups

title: Complaints lodged with Collector over alleged disappearance of earthmover
content: The earthmover in question had been confiscated in November 2024 in connection with the alleged destruction of mangroves in the Kottooli wetlands and an attempt to construct a road

title: BJP-backed Syndicate members accuse govt. of encroaching into university autonomy
content: They allege that the Higher Education department initiated an investigation into the KTU without informing the Vice-Chancellor

title: Government urged to complete construction of Ambedkar Knowledge Center in Vizianagaram
content: Association president alleged that a few YSRCP corporators have been disrupting the stage-2 works despite ₹39.90 lakh being sanctioned for the completion of the G-plus structure

title: Navy inducts ‘stitched sail ship’ as INSV Kaundinya
content: Funded by the Ministry of Culture, the INSV Kaundinya has been constructed using a traditional method of stitching by a team of skilled artisans from Kerala, and is based on a 5th century ship depicted in paintings seen in the Ajanta Caves

title: Gender seminar at Ente Keralam stresses on need for shift in mindset at family-level

title: India declares second Pakistani diplomat persona non grata in ten days

title: ‘48,988 applications received for RGUKT’s 6-year integrated programme’

title: Officials told to swiftly file FIRs against those involved in child marriage activities
content: 43 cases of child marriage have been reported across various taluks in Kalaburagi district between January and April 2025

title: SBIOA donates ₹70 lakh for Wayanad landslide rehabilitation project
content: ₹60 lakh will be used to build three houses in the Wayanad township at Kalpetta, while the remaining ₹10 lakh will support employment-generating activities for customers of the bank affected by the landslide

title: Ronaldo at the Club World Cup? Possible pre-June 14 moves
content: this summer, the 32-team FIFA Club World Cup runs from June 14 to July 13 in the united states . many clubs have agreed to open the summer window early for a short period from June 1-10, before closing it for six days and then re-opening again on June 16 . but the question remains: will some players end the season at one club, then play at the club world cup for another?

title: Everything to know about Knicks-Pacers, Thunder-Wolves
content: the Indiana Pacers , New York Knicks , Oklahoma City Thunder and Minnesota Timberwolves are an obstacle away from reaching the Western Conference finals . the team will continue its attempt to bring the Empire State its first conference title since 2000 . in the West, the Thunder sunk the Denver Nuggets in seven games after beating the Memphis Grizzlies .

title: Panthers win big: Grades for both teams, players to watch for Game 2
content: the Florida Panthers beat the Carolina Hurricanes 5-2 in game 1 of the Eastern Conference finals . one team had four days to prepare, the other barely had 48 hours . a second-period lead led to the Panthers winning their 28th straight playoff game in which they led after two frames .

title: Conn Smythe Watch: Who's leading for MVP of the Stanley Cup playoffs?
content: "Around the Horn" discusses whether the Dallas Stars or the Florida Panthers had the more impressive playoff series win . we asked over two dozen national writers and beat writers who are covering the conference finals for their top three MVP candidates . in the NHL, the Conn Smythe is based on a player's performance during the entire postseason .

title: Karl-Anthony Towns Square, Jalen Brunson Boulevard: NYC co-names streets after Knicks players
content: streets across Manhattan will be temporarily co-named after the Knicks players . the decision was made to honor the team's trip to the Eastern Conference finals . "nearly 8.5 million New Yorkers, and millions more, are behind the New York Knickers," mayor says .

title: Live updates: Spurs open scoring in Europa League final
content: It's finally here! We are down to the final match of the 2024-25  UEFA Europa League  season. Enjoy the play-by-play from today's final:  Tottenham Hotspur  against  Manchester United , live from the San Mamés in Bilbao, Spain. Jump to:   UEL home page  |  Liveblog
